Definition: Ventralmost point on lip of glenoid fossa
Point of maximum curvature along lower scapular neck margin
Intersection between vertebral border and base of scapular spine
Point of maximum curvature along upper scapular neck margin
Union between spine and blade (point of max. concavity on greater scapular notch)
Ventral tip of metacromion or ventralmost point along scapular spine tip when no metacromion is evident
